Translations.Text: aur seenon ke bhed prakaash mein laaye jaayenge
nishchay unaka paalanahaar us din unase poorn roop se soochit hoga
vah khadakhada dene vaalee
kya hai vah khadakha dene vaalee
aur tum kya jaano ki vah khadakhada dene vaalee kya hai
jis din log, bikhare patingon ke samaan (vyaakool) honge
aur parvat, dhunee huee oon ke samaan udenge
to jisake palade bhaaree hue
to vah manachaahe sukh mein hoga
tatha jisake palad halke hue
to usaka sthaan haaviya hai
aur tum kya jaano ki vah (haaviya) kya hai
vah dahaktee aag hai
tumhen adhik (dhan) ke lobh ne magan kar diya
yahaan tak ki tum qabristaan ja pahunche
nishchay tumhen gyaan ho jaayega
phir nishchay hee tumhen gyaan ho jaayega
vaastav mein, yadi tumhen vishvaas hota (to aisa na karate)
tum narak ko avashy dekhoge
phir use vishvaas kee aankh se dekhoge
phir us din tumase sukh sampada ke vishay mein avashy poochh gachh hogee
